default_lock_duration.title: Default Lock Duration
default_lock_duration.tooltip: Set the default duration for locks.

default_lock_extension_duration.title: Default Lock Extension Duration
default_lock_extension_duration.tooltip: Set the duration by which the lock is extended.

global_behavior_variables.title: Global Behavior Variables
global_behavior_variables.tooltip: A list of variables where if the value of the variable matches the defined value, all lights will be off.  This is an OR condition, so any being true will turn off all lights for all zones.  Use this for if you have a variable defined for someone being home, or if the house is asleep.

comparison_type.title: Comparison Type
comparison_type.tooltip: Select the comparison type for the variable.

name.title: Name
name.tooltip: Provide a name for the zone.  This is purely for recognition purposes, and will be used in the Indigo log to display actions being taken for the zone.

lighting_period_ids.title: Linked Lighting Periods
lighting_period_ids.tooltip: Select one or more lighting periods associated with this zone.

on_lights_dev_ids.title: On / Off Lights for this Zone
on_lights_dev_ids.tooltip: List of device IDs that turn lights on and off in the zone.

off_lights_dev_ids.title: Off Lights for this Zone
off_lights_dev_ids.tooltip: List of device IDs that turn lights off in the zone.  Note: Devices already added to the On/Off lights to DOT need to be added to this list.

luminance_dev_ids.title: Luminance Device(s)
luminance_dev_ids.tooltip: Devices that will determine the luminance for the zone.  If multiple are given, the average is taken.

presence_dev_ids.title: Presence Devices
presence_dev_ids.tooltip: Devices that determine if there is presence in the zone or room.

minimum_luminance.title: Minimum Luminance
minimum_luminance.tooltip: Provide minimum luminance for the zone.

minimum_luminance_use_variable.title: Use Variable for Minimum Luminance
minimum_luminance_use_variable.tooltip: When true, the minimum luminance is determined from a variable.

minimum_luminance_var_id.title: Minimum Luminance Variable
minimum_luminance_var_id.tooltip: Set the identifier for the minimum luminance variable.

adjust_brightness.title: Adjust Dimmer Brightness
adjust_brightness.tooltip: When turning on a light, it will calculate the brightness level based on the 1 - (current luminance / minimum luminance) x 100.  Auto Lights will continuously adjust the dimmer as the luminance in the zone changes.

lock_duration.title: Lock Duration
lock_duration.tooltip: A lock occurs when a lighting change occurs on any of the on lights, or off lights outside of the Auto Lights script. The zone becomes locked for a duration, and optionally the lock is extended until no presence is detected in the zone.

extend_lock_when_active.title: Extend Lock When Presence is Active
extend_lock_when_active.tooltip: Enable to extend the lock duration when the zone is active.

lock_extension_duration.title: Lock Extension Duration
lock_extension_duration.tooltip: Overrides the plugin configuration for how long the lock is extended when the zone has presence detected.

unlock_when_no_presence.title: Unlock When No Presence
unlock_when_no_presence.tooltip: Enable to unlock the zone when no presence is detected.  Recommend leaving this off for zones where you may want an override to outlast the presence of the room, like a hallway.

off_lights_behavior.title: Off-Lights Behavior
off_lights_behavior.tooltip: When to turn off devices in your “Off Lights” list during an On-and-Off period: 'do not adjust unless no presence' (default behavior) or 'force off unless zone is locked'.
enum: do not adjust unless no presence
force off unless zone is locked
off_lights_behavior.default: do not adjust unless no presence

exclude_from_lock_dev_ids.title: Exclude these devices from Lock detection
exclude_from_lock_dev_ids.tooltip: These devices will not be used to trigger a lock for the zone.

device_period_map.title: Device to Lighting Period Mappings
device_period_map.tooltip: Maps On / Off Lights to your lighting periods.  By default all lights for the Zone are included in all Lighting Periods, but this can be tweaked here.  When a light is excluded from a Lighting Period, it will not be turned on by Auto Lights script.  However, it will be turned off if the zone is not present.

global_behavior_variables_map.title: Global Behavior Variables Map
global_behavior_variables_map.tooltip: Enable or disable each global behavior variable for this zone

id.title: ID
id.tooltip: Unique identifier for the lighting period.

name.title: Name
name.tooltip: Provide a name for the lighting period.

mode.title: Mode
mode.tooltip: When the lighting period is set to On and Off, the Auto Lights plugin will actively manage the the on/off state for the zone.  When set to Off Only, the plugin will only turn lights off for the zone.

from_time_hour.title: From Time Hour
from_time_hour.tooltip: Specify the starting hour (0-23) for the lighting period.

from_time_minute.title: From Time Minute
from_time_minute.tooltip: Specify the starting minute for the lighting period.

to_time_hour.title: To Time Hour
to_time_hour.tooltip: Specify the ending hour (0-23) for the lighting period.

to_time_minute.title: To Time Minute
to_time_minute.tooltip: Specify the ending minute for the lighting period.

lock_duration.title: Override Lock Duration
lock_duration.tooltip: If desired different from the default, specify the lock duration in seconds for the lighting period.

limit_brightness.title: Limit Brightness
limit_brightness.tooltip: Brightness will be set to a maximum of this value for any dimmers during this period.  Null or -1 to disable.
